about_the_game:
To celebrate the Official Launch of Warlords Awakening a new package has been prepared for you to take on your journey further in Epheia. As you enter the new continent of Botimos, you will surely might new challenges that will test your ability as a true Warlord.

The following is included in the package:

  • The exclusive White Dragon Egg
  • Wise Dragon Hat x1
  • Wise Dragon Costume x1
  • Name-change Coupon x1
  • Appearance-change Coupon x3
  • Alliance Knight's HP Potion x150
  • Alliance Knight's MP Potion x150
  • Alliance Knight's Elixir x100
  • EXP Flask (25%) - 7 Days x1
  • Gold Drop Flask (10%) - 7 Days x1
  • HP/MP Recovery Flask (50%) - 7 Days x1
  • Gold Exchange Certificate (10 Gold) x1
  • Shout [Mint] x20
  • Social Action Group Dance x5
  • Master Key x3


Note: Purchase of this package by itself does not grant you access to the game
detailed_description:
To celebrate the Official Launch of Warlords Awakening a new package has been prepared for you to take on your journey further in Epheia. As you enter the new continent of Botimos, you will surely might new challenges that will test your ability as a true Warlord.

The following is included in the package:

  • The exclusive White Dragon Egg
  • Wise Dragon Hat x1
  • Wise Dragon Costume x1
  • Name-change Coupon x1

  • Alliance Knight's HP Potion x150
  • Alliance Knight's MP Potion x150
  • Alliance Knight's Elixir x100
  • EXP Flask (25%) - 7 Days x1

  • HP/MP Recovery Flask (50%) - 7 Days x1
  • Gold Exchange Certificate (10 Gold) x1

Note: Purchase of this package by itself does not grant you access to the game
name: Warlords Awakening - Botimos Package

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce® GTX660 or Radeon™ RX460
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Geforce® GTX660 or Radeon™ RX460
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce® GTX760 or Radeon™ R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: To celebrate the Official Launch of Warlords Awakening a new package has been prepared for you to take on your journey further in Epheia. As you enter the new continent of Botimos, you will surely might new challenges that will test your ability as a true Warlord.
